meeting_preferences.frequency: minimizes meetings, prefers 30‑minute stand‑ups and bi‑weekly sprint reviews
meeting_preferences.format: video calls when necessary, otherwise async updates

work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (3 days remote, 2 days office in Porto office)
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 2‑3 blocks of 90 minutes per day, protected via calendar

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven, prefers evidence and documented criteria before committing
personality.risk_tolerance: Low to moderate – avoids flaky test strategies, favors stable frameworks
personality.collaboration_style: Structured contributor – provides clear artifacts and follows up on action items
personality.stress_management_approach: Scheduled micro‑breaks, uses Pomodoro technique, practices mindfulness for 10 minutes daily
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Collaborative – seeks win‑win solutions, escalates only when impact is critical

other_commitments: Quarterly tech conference speaking slot (preparation time ~8 hrs)
availability.travel_flexibility: Can travel up to 3 days per quarter for onsite workshops or client demos

personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute train ride to Porto office on hybrid days
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild asthma – avoids prolonged exposure to heavy dust; prefers ergonomic workstation
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aiming to become a Test Automation Lead within 2‑3 years, driven by passion for building robust CI pipelines and mentoring junior engineers

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: One 30‑minute sync per sprint (Monday), optional ad‑hoc when blockers arise
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct but diplomatic – provides actionable points and acknowledges good work
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Maintains a shared ‘Automation Best Practices’ Confluence space, runs monthly brown‑bag sessions on new tools

potential_bottlenecks: Heavy reliance on a single Selenium test suite; any framework instability can stall releases
Limited capacity for parallel test execution due to shared CI resources
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Junior Automation Engineer (Lucas Ferreira) – currently being cross‑trained
burnout_risk_factors: High meeting load during release weeks
Extended periods of on‑call for test failures
